permissions: User must be authorized to access the related project transport plan; permissions are delegated to the project transport plan policy via ProjectTransportPlanTractorPolicy.
validation_notes: Filters accept comma-separated IDs where noted. Status filter accepts only editing or active. Date filters expect YYYY-MM-DD. Boolean filters (has-window-start-at-cached, has-window-end-at-cached, actualizing, most-recent) require true/false; most-recent applies only when true.

flags.name: --project-transport-plan
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --tractor
flags.description: Filter by tractor ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --segment-start
flags.description: Filter by start segment ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --segment-end
flags.description: Filter by end segment ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --has-window-start-at-cached
flags.description: Filter by presence of window start date (true/false)

flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --has-window-end-at-cached
flags.description: Filter by presence of window end date (true/false)

flags.name: --actualizing
flags.description: Filter by whether actualizer window is open (true/false)

flags.name: --most-recent
flags.description: Filter to most recent assignment per tractor (true/false)
flags.validation: Allowed values: true, false. Only applied when true.
